DOC.detailed_description: The rapidly rise incidence gestational diabetes mellitus overweight/obese pregnant woman demand effective diet strategy develop due high risk fetal overgrowth , place newborn increase risk childhood obesity metabolic syndrome . However , lack adequate control randomized clinical trial treatment gestational diabetes diet result consensus panel abandon specific diet recommendation . If effective , diet therapy potential avoid high cost medical treatment intensified fetal monitoring grow population . Although low carbohydrate diet historically advocate decrease glucose excursion meal , carbohydrate typically replace high fat show animal non-human primate data promote insulin resistance , glucose intolerance , liver fat deposition offspring . In fact , recent human data suggest high maternal triglyceride free fatty acid , variable sensitive dietary manipulation , may least important glucose contribute excess fetal growth infant adiposity . Preliminary data base R21 , show compare conventional lower-carbohydrate ( high fat ) diet , provide high complex carbohydrate ( low fat ) diet effectively blunt postprandial glucose improves fast glucose insulin 6-7 week , less adiposity newborn . The investigator global hypothesis compare 8 week low-carbohydrate/higher fat diet , high complex carbohydrate/lower fat diet blunt maternal post-prandial free fatty acid improve insulin resistance . Improved insulin sensitivity reduce fetal over-nutrition decrease substrate availability down-regulating placental nutrient transporter , thereby reduce neonatal adiposity ( primary outcome ) .This proposal build investigator R21 study , first randomize clinical trial provide meal time gestational diabetes diagnosis throughout remainder pregnancy . The aim randomize trial compare effect 8-wk isocaloric high complex carbohydrate/lower fat diet ( 60 % carbohydrate/25 % fat ) vs. conventional low-carbohydrate ( high fat ) ( 40 % carbohydrate/45 % fat ) diet maternal insulin resistance , placental nutrient transporter , neonatal fat development . Innovative approach investigator skilled multidisciplinary team include : maternal insulin resistance systemically ( oral glucose tolerance Index ) locally ( adipose tissue lipolysis ) ; intestinal microbiome ( transfer newborn ) ; neonatal intrahepatic fat ( magnetic resonance spectroscopy ) . Persistence neonatal adiposity relevant understanding obesity risk infant . As investigator pilot data suggest infant microbiome breast milk composition impact fat accrual birth , investigator follow infant 1-yr life accounting variable . Identifying diet gestational diabetes effectively alter maternal/fetal metabolism late pregnancy fetal growth accelerate critical reduce short- long-term metabolic risk grow cohort mother infant . The study result could lead paradigm shift diet therapy gestational diabetes , potential widespread application pregnancy affect obesity alone .
